i have written in the basic information at the beginning also remember to add the same amount of row to both front and back panels if using the first method row 9/9/11/13 rs if you are making a stripy chs bind off cut off your yarn leave the tail a bit longer you can use it later for seaming the parts together these chains will be the sleeves go on the other end of your work where you made the first treble_crochet in the previous row make a slip_stitch at that first treble_crochet make 12/14/17/17 chs this will be the second sleeve see a photo 1 it shows the chains and numbers of chains
